archimate:BusinessProcess.name: Communicate Service improvement Opportunity
archimate:BusinessProcess.documentation: Process Context This process element represents part of the overall enterprise, modeled in business process terms, and can be applied (ie â€œinstantiated") with other similar process elements for application within a specific organization or domain. Brief Description Identify opportunities for improvement Extended Description Not used for this process element Explanatory This process should ensure that the momentum for service improvement is qualified and assuring the communication of the applied changes, new processes, product improvement opportunity is known in the organization Mandatory Register the need for improvements in the service. Optional Not used for this process element
